basics.name: Jack Grimes
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: I am a London-based data scientist with experience in financial services, epidemiology, engineering and physics

education.thesis: An investigation into the roles of water, sanitation, and hygiene in the control of schistosomes and other helminths
courses: Statistical comparisons between water and sanitation risk factors and infection, using R
GIS and spatial statistics using R and ArcGIS
First author of 6 papers, also contributed to 5 more (see Google Scholar)

Fieldwork: spent around 6 months of my Ph.D. in Ethiopia - supervising data collection (training and supervision of 41 data collectors, data collected from over 100,000 children in over 2,000 schools)
Fieldwork: also building partnerships with external institutions, negotiating contracts, obtaining equipment, hiring staff etc
Supervision of two M.Sc. students during my Ph.D. work (and, more recently, an M.Eng. student in 2020)
presentations: The American Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene Annual Meetings: (2012, 2013, and 2016)
The Wellcome Centre for Global Health Research Annual Meeting (2016)
The launch of the Centre for International Child Health at Imperial College London (2016)
The International Society for Neglected Tropical Diseases: Water Conference (2014)
Many less formal meetings in London
